Posts.Content: Mar 15, 2013 09:45AM lfejohnson1968 wrote: Thanks for your information. I just finished to talk to my BS and I will have the biopsy done on Wednesday  theydo not see cancer but they see ADH and ALH and my best understand is that theyare seeing both. Basicly I am looking one step more close to Breast cancer. I ask if instead of biopsy will be better just go and remove everything but they think is impractical ( or maybe I am crazy). I was told if this biopsy is positive then I will need to have and MRI and then will decide if we get lobectomy or mastectomy. I just thinking in the worse case scenary because even when they sound optimist I am not the hole seems getting deeper. Thank so much for listen and reply. Mean so much that I am not alone. Thanks again

But everytime I took this approch I find my self in a deeper hole so speak. I guess I just have to wait and see.  Probably will be until next friday that I have some news. Monday is my pre- testing and Wednesday is the procedure. I will keep posting.
